actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to review as to its suitability for preservation as wilderness the area commonly known as the Sheep Mountain Area in the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to review, as to its suitability for preservation as wilderness, the area commonly known as the Sheep Mountain Area in the State of California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to review as to its suitability for preservation as wilderness the area commonly known as the Sheep Mountain Area in the State of California.
